revision.text:
{{codepointer|Classic attack|Strife|r=Programmer}} '''A_ProgrammerMelee'''
(no parameters)
==Usage== If the calling actor has a target within melee range, plays the sound "programmer/clank" on the WEAPON channel and inflicts 6d10 melee damage to this target.
This codepointer is restricted to {{Class|Programmer}} and derived classes.
